entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 6.
